tokens.text: identifies JSON files that do not match known schemas

title: Unknown JSON
description: Identifies JSON files that don't match any known Minecraft content schema. Unknown JSON files may indicate misplaced content or unsupported custom formats.

fields.title: Unknown JSON Type
fields.description: Warning when a JSON file is found that doesn't match any recognized Minecraft schema. The file may be in the wrong location, use an outdated format, or be non-Minecraft content.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the unrecognized JSON file
